info.name: Learning Platform API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Learning Platform Backend

## Authentication
- Admin: admin@learningplatform.com / AdminPassword123!
- Student: ahmad.rizki@student.com / password123
- Mentor: maya.sari@mentor.com / password123

## Database IDs
- Users: 1-10 (admin: 1-3, students: 4-6, mentors: 7-9, corporate: 10)
- Courses: 2-10
- Subscriptions: 2-4 (user_id 4)
- Organizations: 1-5
- Scholarships: 1-10
- Articles: 1-6
- Achievements: 1-8
- Experiences: 1-10
